entry.title: hompage
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to my hompage! In this article I will show you how I build it and how you can do it to! Keep in mind, was not my idea it was thanks to Techno Tim. We will use the jekyll-theme-chirpy: Github Before we Beginn Install Dependencies (Ruby, RubyGems, Jekyll, Bundle, Git): for Fedora: sudo dnf install ruby rubygems ruby-devel gcc gcc-c++ rpm-build or for Arch: sudo pacman -...
